description: This filling veggie dahl is the perfect comfort food for a cold winter day.
keywords: Dahl,Seafood free,Sweet potato,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Hearty Sweet Potato & Red Lentil Dahl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs root ginger, peeled and minced
500g sweet potato, peeled and chopped into cubes

recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan on a high heat, saut√© the onion in olive oil for 5 minutes to soften. Add the ginger, chilli and garlic and cook for another 2 minutes, add the spices and cook for another 1 minute.
Add the lentils and mix to coat well, then pour over the chopped tomatoes and coconut milk, then add 2 cans full of water.
Bring to the boil, stir and cover. Simmer for 10 minutes then stir in the sweet potato cubes, cover with a lid allowing a little steam to escape, and simmer for 35 minutes, stirring occasionally.
After 35 minutes, check that the sweet potato and lentils are tender and serve.
